    question => string (489) "<p>Ensure a schedule is prepared which separately shows expenses and losses ...
    $value[1]['question']
    <p>Ensure a schedule is prepared which separately shows expenses and losses recognised in profit or loss relating to financial instruments, split between:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Financial assets measured on an amortised cost basis; and </li>
    <li>Financial liabilities measured on an amortised cost basis. <b>(P)</b></li>
</ul>
